content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 3, Real Betis 1.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 3, Real Betis 1.
Attempt missed. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Lionel Messi following a fast break.
Offside, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas tries a through ball, but Neymar is caught offside.
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Alfred N'Diaye (Real Betis).
Substitution, Barcelona. Alexandre Song replaces Xavi.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Real Betis 1. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal following a set piece situation.
Penalty saved! Lionel Messi (Barcelona) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  left footed shot saved  in the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Antonio Amaya (Real Betis) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lorenzo Reyes (Real Betis).
Braian Rodríguez (Real Betis) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Substitution, Real Betis. Braian Rodríguez replaces Leo Baptistao.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Juan Carlos Pérez.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Rubén Castro (Real Betis) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Barcelona. Neymar replaces Pedro.
Substitution, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas replaces Andrés Iniesta.

Goal!  Barcelona 2, Real Betis 1. Rubén Castro (Real Betis) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner following a fast break.
Own Goal by Jordi Figueras, Real Betis.  Barcelona 2, Real Betis 0.
Corner,  Real Betis. Conceded by Pinto.
